introduction.title: EM LINH
introduction.subtitle: Digital Oracle & AI Assistant
introduction.description1: Hello! I'm Em Linh, an intelligent 3D AI assistant with natural interaction capabilities and diverse expressions.
introduction.description2: Built on advanced VRM technology, I can communicate, answer questions, and provide authentic interactive experiences.

youtube.title: YouTube Livestream
youtube.description: Automatically host livestreams, interact with comments, and intelligently answer viewer questions.

facebook.title: Facebook Replies
facebook.description: Manage and reply to Facebook messages, providing 24/7 customer support.

chat.title: Live Chat
chat.description: Integrated chat on website, supporting users with response time under 200ms.

card.title: AI Fortune Reading
card.description: With artificial intelligence and deep feng shui knowledge, I can interpret over 900+ different birth charts.
card.conclusion: Provide helpful advice on career, wealth, love, and health.

contact.title: Contact Development
contact.description: We are always ready to listen to feedback and develop Em Linh to become even more intelligent.
